questions.question: In which year did Babur ascend to the throne of Fergana?
What is the name of Babur's autobiography, which provides a detailed account of his life and reign?
Which of the following regions was not conquered by Babur during his lifetime?
Babur defeated Ibrahim Lodi in the First Battle of Panipat. What was the key factor that contributed to Babur's victory?
Babur referred to India as the 'land of wealth and splendor' but also criticized its social practices. Which practice did he specifically condemn?
